name: Molekill
description:
Game from UE4 Spring Jam.

NOTE:

The sensitivity sliders don't work. And sound settings don't save.

 Hitting pause in the main level removes the quest widget  for "Molecules Left".  The quest is still active, but it just doesn't show. 

There are some molecules that can't be reached that are near a mushroom. You'll have to restart the game and hopefully it doesn't prop up too high. This is because I add a random number to its height, and well, it sometimes gets the max value and I didn't test it.  

The particles really slow down on my computer when entering rage mode. Hopefully, it will run okay on yours!

Lore (Spoilers...sort of?):

You play as Mother Nature and she has been frozen in an icy cave in the north pole. But recently, the greenhouse gases CO2, CFC, and methane has melted her out of slumber and she has awoken to destroy the molecules. She must kill all of those molecules. She must...mole-KILL them all TO D3TH. (pronounced as maw-le-kill like molecule but kill not cule).

Team of two:  Andrew Esberto and jessica Swindle ( DrewAndJessie)

Andrew Esberto - Programming, Blueprints, Animations, Game Design, Sound Design

Jessica Swindle - 3D Artist, Textures, Game Design/Idea

Assets created prior to game jam or 3rd party assets:

music by AndySv : https://www.gamedevmarket.net/asset/mega-game-music-collection/

all sfx by wowsoundsg : https://www.gamedevmarket.net/asset/rpg-magic-sfx-pack-2/

cel shading post processor : https://forums.unrealengine.com/unreal-engine/events/1407662-unreal-engine-lives...

emitters by fxvariety pack (free version from unreal store)

pink floaty instructional words - me in past game jam
